dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 9111 IH: Infants Need Food And Nutrition Today Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Peltola introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and Labor

form.official-title: To require the Secretary of Agriculture to allow infant food combinations and dinners as WIC-eligible foods.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Infants Need Food And Nutrition Today Act or the INFANT Act.

subsection.text: Not later than 30 days after the date of the enactment of this section, the Secretary of Agriculture shall allow infant food combinations and dinners to be eligible to be served under the supplemental nutrition program for women, infants, and children under section 17 of the Child Nutrition Act of 1966 (42 U.S.C. 1786).
The Secretary of Agriculture shall issue and revise regulations in accordance with subsection (a).
